parameters.name: DeleteAll
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all the specified tags. This parameter takes effect only if the TagKeys parameter is specified. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: ResourceIds
parameters.description: The IDs of resources. Separate multiple resource IDs with comma (,).

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Set the value to `application`.

parameters.name: TagKeys
parameters.description: The tag keys. Separate multiple tag keys with commas (,).
